dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Gah!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: See, we didn't even touch Mr. Fluffy. What the hell.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Well fine, but what about the others?

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Didn’t touch 'em either.  Get with the program, here.

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: You were right, what we were doing to the monsters was wrong.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Wait, I need a minute here.

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: We’ll find a home for your friends.  Come on, bring Mr. Fluffy with you and let’s all go home.

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: That’s all well and good, but we still need to deal with the civilians.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Yeah… Okay.  I can stop the monsters.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: What was that about a park?
